meta.description: Optimize the number of trains and trams to transport at least 600 people per hour with constraints on the number of trams relative to trains.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each transportation type in terms of people per hour.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of transportation unit.

objective.name: min_total_units
objective.description: Minimize the total number of transportation units.

constraints.name: transport_capacity
constraints.description: Ensure at least 600 people can be transported per hour.

constraints.name: tram_train_ratio
constraints.description: The number of trams must be at least twice the number of trains.
